short_summary: Rental of firearms range for mandatory Fishery Officer annual firearms qualification
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement to rent a shooting range for mandatory Fishery Officer annual firearms qualification.
tags: *Rental of commercial or industrial facility described in UNSPSC (80131502)
full_summary:
# Firearms Range Rental Opportunity for Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada

### Tender Summary

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Canada is inviting bidders to offer a rental agreement for a shooting range to support mandatory annual firearms qualification for Fishery Officers stationed in the Lower Fraser Area and Regional Headquarters.

### Tender Details

| **Solicitation Information** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number (numero de sollicitation) | 30005566 |
| Publication Date (date de publication) | 2024-03-18 |
| Tender Closing Date (date limite de soumission) | 2024-04-03T13:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date (date prévue pour la prise d'effet du contrat) | 2024-05-13 |
| Expected Contract End Date (date prévue pour la fin du contrat) | 2026-05-31 |
| Regions of Opportunity (régions cibles) | British Columbia |
| Regions for Delivery (régions de livraison) | Langley, Canada, British Columbia |

### Category and Notice Type

* Category: SRV
* Type of Notice: Advance Contract Award Notice (Préavis d'attribution du contrat)

### Description of Requirement

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires a shooting range rental for the annual firearms qualification of Fishery Officers. Access to the range will be required from May 13-17 and 20-24, 2024, from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm. The supplier will be responsible for providing essential facilities for Conservation and Protection staff, including washroom area cleaning supplies, paper towels, and toilet paper. The supplier must also provide target backers for the duration of the rental.

Additionally, the same requirements will apply to the following dates:

* May 12-16, 2025
* May 26-30, 2025
* May 11-15, 2026
* May 25-29, 2026

### Contracting Entity Information and Contact Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans - Material and Procurement Services
* Contact: Tina Brown, (506) 238-3224, Tina.Brown@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

The Tender Description in detail can be accessed through the following canadabuys.canada.ca site.
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
